articles.author: Louise Boyle
articles.title: Satellite images show massive Saharan dust storm engulfing western Europe - The Independent
articles.description: Storm Celia has carried dust from North Africa to Europe, affecting air quality in a number of countries
articles.content:
New satellite images have revealed the scale of the vast Saharan dust cloud blanketing western Europe.
Storm Celia is driving a warm air mass filled with dust from North Africa to Europe, affecting … [+2356 chars]

articles.description: Torres will take over as president of Indian operations on April 1 while continuing to oversee Nissan's European Regional Business Unit East (Russia) and Nissan's Spanish Industrial Operations, according to the company. He will report to Guillaume Cartier, Ni…
articles.content:

articles.author: Tara John and Isabelle Jani Friend, CNN
articles.title: Europe thought it was done with Covid-19. But the virus isn't done with Europe - CNN
articles.description: Covid-19 cases and hospitalizations are rising in an increasingly restriction-free Europe.
